```{r}
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
head(diamonds)
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = diamonds) + geom_histogram(aes(x = carat))
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x = carat, y = price)) + 
    geom_point(aes(color = cut)) + facet_grid(clarity~color)
```
